# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files
# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY  connect.cir connect.cir.sh tags DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/connect.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}CONNECTIVITY/connect.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} connect.cir.sh ${XYCE_BINARY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} connect.cir ${OutputDataDir}/CONNECTIVITY/connect.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}CONNECTIVITY/connect.cir.sh PROPERTY ATTACHED_FILES_ON_FAIL ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/connect.cir.err )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}CONNECTIVITY/connect.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;bjt;bjtlev1;bsrc;resistor;capacitor")
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}CONNECTIVITY/connect.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} connect.cir.sh "mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 ${XYCE_BINARY}" ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} connect.cir ${OutputDataDir}/CONNECTIVITY/connect.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}CONNECTIVITY/connect.cir.sh PROPERTY ATTACHED_FILES_ON_FAIL ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/connect.cir.err )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}CONNECTIVITY/connect.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;bjt;bjtlev1;bsrc;resistor;capacitor")
endif()
